description:
Weight matters, but so does hydration. Injection molded from a lightweight nylon, the Speed C cage cradles your bottle and adds only 39g to your ride.

  • Lightweight injection molded nylon
  • Elongated mounting holes that you finetune the position
  • Supportive beams hold most bike bottles and other 74mm diameter bottles with ease
name: Cannondale Speed C Nylon Water Bottle Cage
